items.sentence: Tom certainly talks as if he knows what he\'s talking about.
A man is as old as he feels and a woman as old as she looks.
Tom should have told Mary right away that he wasn\'t single.
Why don\'t you try putting a little cinnamon in your coffee?
You\'re the only person I know that has ever visited Boston.
Tom wanted to study Japanese with a native Japanese speaker.
Tom was almost crushed by the tree that he was cutting down.
Tom was angry at Mary for leaving their children unattended.
Tom was glad that Mary understood what he was trying to say.
Tom didn\'t even have the courtesy to say that he was sorry.
There\'s a good chance that Tom will be here this afternoon.
Tom couldn\'t produce any evidence to back his statement up.
Tom didn\'t even write one letter to Mary while he was away.
Don\'t make me angry. You wouldn\'t like me when I\'m angry.
Tom has asked me to meet him at his office tomorrow at 2:30.
Tom has offered to take care of the children this afternoon.
Tom hopes that Mary will like the present he bought for her.
You can\'t go yet because you still have a few things to do.
You don\'t know how bad I want to learn how to speak French.
You don\'t need to be a rocket scientist to figure that out.
